name: Freecell Academy
description:
Enjoy a unique twist on a classic card game with our anime-themed Freecell game. Immerse yourself in a colorful world filled with exciting challenges. Master the game's strategy and feel accomplishment as you progress. Whether you're a fan of anime or just enjoy a good puzzle, this Freecell game is sure to provide hours of entertainment. Download now and experience the magic of anime-inspired solitaire!

  • Classic Freecell gameplay
  • Anime-themed graphics and characters
  • Unlimited undo
  • Move hints if you get stuck
  • Timer to track completion time
  • Options for music volume, auto play, score and timer.
